CommandDefinition.Name: addkeyfiles
CommandDefinition.Description: Add the identity contained in the specified file.

Argument.Name: publickeyfile
Argument.Description: File name containing the public key.

Argument.Name: privatekeyfile
Argument.Description: File name containing the private key.

Argument.Name: passphrase
Argument.Description: Passphrase used during generation of the given key.
